articles.title: FA Cup fourth and fifth round draw details confirmed for Liverpool and Everton - Liverpool Echo

articles.content:
The fourth and fifth round draws of the FA Cup are due to take place on Monday.

articles.title: West Ham 'targeting Arsenal striker Eddie Nketiah as potential Sebastien Haller replacement' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Hammers sold club-record signing Haller to Dutch giants Ajax for a £22million fee, just 18 months after signing the Ivory Coast international for £45m.
articles.content:
West Ham are targeting Arsenal striker Eddie Nketiah as a potential replacement for Sebastien Haller, according to reports.

articles.title: EFL records 112 Covid cases in a week with almost one third from just three clubs - Daily Mail
articles.description: The English Football League has published the results of Covid-testing among 66 clubs in the Championship, Leagues One and Two. It is the first full test to take place since November.
articles.content:
Clubs in the English Football League recorded 112 positive tests for coronavirus among staff and players during a week of testing.

articles.description: New Paris Saint-Germain boss Mauricio Pochettino wants Manchester City legend Sergio Aguero on a free transfer in the summer as he settles back into management
articles.content:
